name: Leviathan Axe - Unreal Engine 4
description:
Hi everyone! I am happy to share with you my lastest project that I have started last week. Its a character and weapon system that allow create specific characters and weapons all of them compatible each other.

For the first weapon, I replicated the Leviathan axe from God of War (2018). All its done with Unreal Engine 4 and fully C++.

I hope you enjoy!
